name: Aluminium Door
description: Resistant to weather, but lighter than Stone Buildings, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base, bringing with you the equivalent of a Stone Base in your backpack. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.
